fields.capital_expenditure_10: X3 Hw Upgrade, Cables, 3 Lead Ecg Trun
fields.comments: Page 3 – Obstetric Peak Daily Census Includes Patients IN Labor And Delivery Rooms. Page 6 - Outpatients Served: Outpatient Visits Of 391,801 Reflect All The Visits Provided And Billed By The Hospital, Including The Reoccurring Visits. Page 6 - Charity Care Patients & Page 17 Charity Care Services: Charity Care Information Will Be Provided As Soon As It Is Available. Page 9 - Newborn Care Patient Days: Lutheran General Hospital Captures All Level Ii+ Newborn Patient Days IN The Neonatal Intensive Care Unit For Clinical Reasons. The Nicu Had 7,064 Level I-II Days And 8,756 Level Iii+ Days For A Total Of 15,820 Patient Days IN 2024 As Reported On Page 4 - Neonatal Intensive Care Inpatient Days. Lgh Had A Total Of 6,281 Newborn Level I And Level II Patient Days IN The Normal Newborn Nursery. Page 9 - Newborn Care Beds - Lutheran General Hospital Has A Total Of 56 Newborn Beds That Are Available For Either Level I OR Level Ii. Page 11 - Diagnostic, Imaging, Therapeutic: Reflects Treatments, Not Courses Of Treatments. Page 11 – Lgh Decommissioned A Nuclear Medicine Skylight Unit IN 2024. Page 17 - Inpatient And Outpatient Revenues: Bad Debt Of $42,612,382 Is Included IN The Total Net Revenue. Medicare Managed Care Net Revenue Is Reported With Traditional Medicare Net Revenue, And Medicaid Managed Care Net Revenue Is Reported With Traditional Medicaid Net Revenue.
fields.facility_diversity_comments: This Is A System Wide Report For Advocate Health Mw Region (il/Wi).
fields.planned_diversity_expenditures: Our Organization Seeks Qualified Suppliers For New Construction Projects, Renovations, Goods And Services (where Applicable) And Some Maintenance. We Understand The Importance Of Fairness And Equal Opportunity IN Our Procurement Processes And Are Dedicated To Making These Principles A Fundamental Part Of Our Sourcing Of Construction Suppliers.
fields.plan_for_diversity_recruitment: We Have A Number Of Strategies To Continue To Keep This Top-Of-Mind With Our Core Vendors And Our Construction Leaders. 1. Senior Leaders, As A Part Of These Presentations, Present On Our Commitment To Partnering With A Variety Of Qualified Vendors. 2. Meetings With Vendors And System Leaders On Spend Include Discussions Of Promoting Fair, Equitable Processes That Ensure Engagement With A Broad Array Of Qualified Subcontractors. 3. We Ask For And Expect Reports Quarterly From Our Major Suppliers For Tracking Purposes. 4. We Promote Our Project Objectives, Goals, Strategies And Measures (ogsm) During The Year. 5. Advocate Health Has An Experienced, Full-Time System Leader For This Work, Who Works With Senior Construction Leaders Closely. 6. Construction Directors For Advocate Health Have Discussions About Results On Their Projects IN The 1:1 Reviews With The System Vp- Design & Construction Quarterly 7. We Exhibit And Present At Tradeshows And Events To Share Current Organizational Needs.
fields.challenges_to_diversity_recruitment: As A General Matter, Across All Vendor Categories, Advocate Has Faced Challenges Identifying New Suppliers That Have Experience With Healthcare-Specific Construction And Other Project Needs.
fields.hsfrb_assistance: Continue To Support The Communities You Serve By Promoting Programs And Requirements That Uplift Local Businesses. Healthcare Construction May Involve Distinct Levels Of Risk And Necessitate Additional Training And Awareness Compared To Other Industries. Courses And Entry-Level Programs IN Healthcare Construction Can Be Designed To Create New Opportunities For Individuals IN This Field. Engaging A Subject Matter Expert Can Provide Valuable Support To Advance These Initiatives. Additionally, Supporting Organizations That Facilitate These Developments Could Help Expedite The Process.
fields.point_of_contact: Contractors Should Understand And Learn Who Advocate Health's Major Design Firms And Contractors Are. Those Contractors Also Have Information Sessions, Training, And Partner With Our Organization To Offer Healthcare Construction Exposure. Networking With Multiple Groups Helps. I Would Also Encourage Potential Vendors To Become Listed With Those Prime Contractors, Too. Stacy Crouther System Director-Supplier Diversity & Inclusion Stacy.crouther@aah.org
fields.enrollment_process: Contractors Should Understand And Learn Who Advocate Health's Major Design Firms And Contractors Are. Those Contractors Also Have Information Sessions, Training, And Partner With Our Organization To Offer Healthcare Construction Exposure. Networking With Multiple Groups Helps. I Would Also Encourage Potential Vendors To Become Listed With Those Prime Contractors, Too. Stacy Crouther System Director-Supplier Diversity & Inclusion Stacy.crouther@aah.org
fields.examples_of_successes: Our On-Going Work With Chicago United, Health Anchor Network Impact Purchasing Commitment, And Match Making Exchanges Continues To Be An Example Of How Large Companies And Qualified Vendors Can Connect And Gain Exposure. Our Construction Directors Strategically Seek Innovative Opportunities To Help Businesses Grow. Advocate Health Is A Founding Member Of The Democracy Collaborative Now Known As The Healthcare Anchor Network (han), A National Organization Of 70 Health Systems. We Are Able To Network And Learn From Other Health Systems And See The Impact Of A Place-Based Approach
